author: Huawei
description:
Shopping is getting smarter. It's more personalized, more efficient, and more connected. But what's powering this transformation? 
 
In this episode of #HuaweiDecoded, host Zach Overline speaks with Kevin Kong, General Manager of Enterprise Logistics and Retail at Huawei, to explore how AI, big data, and cloud technologies are reshaping retail. 
 
Discover how digital transformation is revolutionizing the way we shop: https://bit.ly/48WQ8Bg #Huawei #SmartRetail
title: From Data to Discounts: The Rise of Smart Retail, Decoded
